input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Man Sportful Srk Jersey 1124034'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Elevate Long-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP World Tour Pro Air Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Evolve Pro Air Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='men Sportful Te Bodyfit Team Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Orbit Pro Air Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='Sportful Snap Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Evade Thermal 2.0 Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Light & Breathable Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Gravel Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Trail T3 Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Flusso Limited Edition Full-Zip Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Passista FZ Limited Edition Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Ventaglio Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Giro d'Italia Roma 2024 Short Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Country-Collection Germany Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Espresso Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Castelli Pave' Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Expedition Merino Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Alt_Road 2.0 Jersey Long Sleeve'
  - Name='MAAP Evade Thermal LS Jersey'
  - Name='Pac Summit Men's Aero Jersey'
  - Name='ASSOS Equipe Rs L39Ion Replica Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Unlimited Trail 2 Long Sleeve Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are cycling jerseys designed for comfort and performance; likely similar lightweight and moisture-wicking features, though Pearl Izumi's is described as classic, which may imply fewer tech features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Srk Jersey 1124034
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey from Sportful likely shares many construction and functional similarities but possibly different fit or materials compared to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pearl Izumi Elevate Long-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey but long-sleeve variant; while similar in function and features, difference in sleeve length affects relevancy somewhat.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP World Tour Pro Air Jersey 2.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium cycling jersey with advanced fabrics and design, very close in purpose and likely features to the Core Jersey; both focus on performance and comfort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Evolve Pro Air Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey 2.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar high-performance jersey but long sleeve; shared function and advanced features but different sleeve length lowers exact relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Sportful Te Bodyfit Team Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A form-fitting, performance cycling jersey very similar in purpose, material, and construction to the Core Jersey, designed for cycling comfort and durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Orbit Pro Air Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey 2.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve pro cycling jersey with advanced features; similar materials and technology but differing in sleeve length and perhaps fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Snap Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey from a performance brand, likely comparable lightweight construction and moisture-wicking features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Evade Thermal 2.0 Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal and long sleeve jersey geared towards cooler weather; while still a cycling jersey, differs in intended temperature range and sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Light & Breathable Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight, breathable cycling jersey aligns well in purpose and function with the Core Jersey, though brand and specific materials may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Gravel Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specifically designed for gravel cycling with ultra-light mesh; still a cycling jersey but may have different fit and fabric emphasis.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Trail T3 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end cycling jersey, possibly trail-oriented; shares core functions like fit and moisture management but may differ in cut or tech details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Flusso Limited Edition Full-Zip Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey with full zip and technical fabrics, very similar in construction and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Passista FZ Limited Edition Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full-zip performance cycling jersey, comparable in features, construction, and purpose to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Ventaglio Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey with technical fabrics; similar in tech but sleeve length reduces direct relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Giro d'Italia Roma 2024 Short Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve, race-oriented cycling jersey; matches core usage and function closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Country-Collection Germany Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey likely similar in cut and tech but as a country collection might prioritize aesthetics over performance features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Espresso Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance road cycling jersey, likely similar material, fit, and construction as the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pearl Izumi Expedition Merino Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Merino wool cycling jersey offers different material benefits, suitable for different climates; shares function but differing fabric and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Alt_Road 2.0 Jersey Long Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey with performance features; relevant but sleeve length reduces similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Evade Thermal LS Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal long sleeve cycling jersey for cooler weather, more specialized than the Core Jersey's lightweight focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pac Summit Men's Aero Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aero cycling jersey focusing on speed and fit; relevant to Core Jersey but may have different specific features and fabric composition.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling jersey similar in design, technology, and intended use; close match in function and quality.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve trail-oriented cycling jersey; shares some materials and function but differs by sleeve length and likely use case.
